channel.title: Soundless Jade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Soundless Jade" - how to drain it before root level ?

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded: I had to use mine instantly when I got it to use for Digital Keychain…..it sucks upgrading PW gear

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded:
ty for all ur help.
i will keep try until my max level, hope i can pass it if not i will do loop and do it again.
ty again.

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded: oh, and i would argue that no greater then a 10% chance of beating the discords is needed and you will spend more time recompiling then it would take to play the probebility. mathematically, if you have a 5% chance, it takes on average only 20 attempts which is not that much seeing as it happens quiet frequently (1/20 tries? maybe more)

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded: i obtained the keys in season 7. just make sure to max out your levels (to the best of your abilities) and obtain as many pre-r00t items as possible. furthermore stating in levels/range in your awesome really saves a couple weeks of farming as well. once you have done all of that, only recompile one stat at a time. doing so allows you to farm more core using the new feild key your have aquire and increases the rate that you will beat r00t all together. i would also encourage speed looping at some point. if you go all the way to S20 you probebly wont even loose to a phase.

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded: you should know there are people that did beat it before your season. just recompile some range and levels. with those up you should get a better chance of beating it. (i would suggest around 40+total range and possibly 12+ total strength. other than that, max out your levels and complete all other content you can then try more.

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded:
as sannin :
@PW mission : the best achieved is Euthanasia. without Digital Keychan i can not go continue.

Digital Keychan is needed to finish the "Ready to Ride" but u can not create digital keychan without soundless jade item.

the soundless jade item can get by drain the phase only.

drain the phase opion available after the Root Level by shoot the core option.

to achieve the root level u need to get the RPM keys that need u a high stat to pass the obstacle GNT 35D/40S.

without the RPM Keys @Root Mission : only for Twilight Guardian and stop, can not go for more.

the best and maximum team can build is only detective duo : tsukasa lv.2 + smokey lv.2.

doughman lv.2/3, K.Y lv.2, Stalker lv.3 only available after the RPM keys trouble.

so, nothing more i can do before S9 to achieve Root Level. damn….

ty

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded:
Pizza Witch is literally unbeatable without doing r00t first. You can beat it the easy way (I did), but the hard way requires you to have The Eleven Tails.

There are exactly three allies in the entire game who do anything in fields. Stalker 3 (+1 Stamina in fields), K.Y. 2 (+25% Core), and Doughmon 2/3 (Access to Bitshop 2). None of them will help you beat up discords, but you should use this team for it's other benefits.

Do not count on the Twilight Guardian. I was never able to get a discord to show up before it evaporated.

Now for some good news. There is a r00t recompiling calculator for windows developed by blueaddict. There is also a spreadsheet that accomplishes the same thing by catprog.

Don't bother recompiling much past a 20% or so chance of success. The discords show up often enough that you can afford a 1 in 5 win rate.

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded:
how far have you recompiled? keep in mind i was a maxed S9 (so my levels were 41 before item bonuses) when i did it and i had everything completed and was in bankai.)

these are the approximate stats i completed it with:

Gen: 41
Lvl: 30 (+5)
Rng: 37 (+5)
Str: 11 (+1)
Suc: 2

Nin: 41
Lvl: 30 (+5)
Rng: 37 (+6)
Str: 10 (+1)
Suc: 2 (+1)

Tai: 41
Lvl: 33 (+5)
Rng: 38 (+5)
Str: 10 (+1)
Suc: 2

remember without the range you won't have any chance of passing.

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded: what are your base stats? maybe one of us here can help you figure out how to recompile to pass the RPM block.

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded:
i need this item to create Digital Keychan.
but, still can not get RPM keys.

if i know the minimum stat requirement to pass the GNT 35D/40S for RPM keys. :(
i use the success callculator but when i increase the stat, the result is closed to 0% with max only 9%. :((

ty

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded: Confirmed. r00t lets you shoot the core, which is the only way to get the last four lost weapons.

item.title: Re: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded: while you can fight phases without r00t rank it seems that you would need r00t rank to actually drain this item as it's non-tradable.

item.title: Soundless Jade
item.content:encoded:
is there no way to drain this item before root level achieved ?

ty
